Articles.Content: Hi, i have explored all objects in ksp so I tried to download some planet packs to add just a bit more to play around with. I have installed many of them and tried one by one, but any of those works. What can I do? Where should I find  a tutorial? I have checked other mods compatibilities but I can't exactly understand where the problems really is, but I can understand that the problem might come from kopernicus, what shall I do? Can someone explain me how to give this mod work? Thank u all, have a good day

On 6/23/2019 at 6:43 PM, luca kerman said:

Hi, i have explored all objects in ksp so I tried to download some planet packs to add just a bit more to play around with. I have installed many of them and tried one by one, but any of those works. What can I do? Where should I find  a tutorial? I have checked other mods compatibilities but I can't exactly understand where the problems really is, but I can understand that the problem might come from kopernicus, what shall I do? Can someone explain me how to give this mod work? Thank u all, have a good day

Do you use KSP 1.7.2? So, Kopernicus isn`t working in 1.7.2. You must go back to KSP 1.7.1. I think Thomas will update Kopernicus for 1.7.3.

2 hours ago, Cheesecake said:

Do you use KSP 1.7.2? So, Kopernicus isn`t working in 1.7.2. You must go back to KSP 1.7.1. I think Thomas will update Kopernicus for 1.7.3.

No im using ksp 1.4.3, i choosen the version to allow mods working
